Title: TicTacToe using WPF 3.0
Description:
TicTacToe is a WPF 3.0 game that is good learning tool for WPF beginners as well as fun game for kids!
It uses many WPF aspects like, data-binding, TemplateBinding, 2D animations, ControlTemplates, Styles.
In the next release, I am planning to add 3D effects and ICommands.
